name: Legend of the Unicorn King - HTML5 Ver.
name_original: Legend of the Unicorn King - HTML5 Ver.
description:
Wrought from a child's imagination, the Legend of the Unicorn King explores the magical region of Under Bed.  Our Unicorn King has to avoid many enemies and obstacles as he traverses his kingdom.

For the 2021 Flair Fair. Please rate if you enjoyed! https://itch.io/jam/flair-fair/rate/958331?before=2#post-2876082

Team entry: NebNova - Programming Jen - Art/Animations Davey347 - Sound Effects/Art Lova - Music/Sound Effects Polymorphic - Programming
